interpretation: The "cigarette" card is a reminder to take a break and indulge in self-care. It can symbolize a need to slow down and relax, as well as a desire for instant gratification. However, this card can also represent addiction and the negative impact it can have on one's health and well-being. It may be a call to reassess habits and make healthier choices. Associated keywords include: relaxation, addiction, temptation, indulgence, self-care, and health.
